name: df-sdrg
body: |- wceq(csdrg, cmpt(s0, cdr, crab(s1, cfv(csubrg, cv(s0)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cress, cv(s1)), cdr))))
comment: A sub-division-ring is a subset of a division ring's set which is a division ring under the induced operation. If the overring is commutative this is a field; no special consideration is made of the fields in the center of a skew field. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Oct-2015.)
